title: Modern Mangalsutra - Rose Gold Diamond Pendant with Black Beads
materials: Rose Gold plated base metal. Simulated Diamonds with brilliant cut. Black beads.
features: A modern twist on the traditional Mangalsutra. Features a square pendant set with simulated diamonds in a double halo setting. The pendant design offers a contemporary geometric aesthetic, framed with a square silhouette. The black beads are strung along a delicate rose gold chain, providing a minimalist yet sophisticated look.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. Suitable for engagement parties
or as a thoughtful gift. Also appropriate for modern brides seeking a non-traditional Mangalsutra.
description: A contemporary take on a traditional symbol, this Mangalsutra blends modern aesthetics with timeless significance. The rose gold finish adds warmth and elegance, while the sparkling simulated diamonds capture the light beautifully. Durable and comfortable for everyday wear. A meaningful and stylish addition to any jewelry collection.
